articles.description: JONATHAN MCEVOY IN MONTREAL: A week after struggling to climb out of his Mercedes in Baku after being bounced around in the cockpit, the seven-time champion's back pain had vanished.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton finished third in the Canadian Grand Prix and declared: 'I am back to being young again!'
A week after struggling to climb out of his Mercedes in Baku after being bounced around in th… [+1869 chars]

articles.title: The best and worst transfer unveilings after City shared throwback photos of Erling Haaland - Daily Mail
articles.description: Manchester City completed the signing of Borussia Dortmund superstar Erling Haaland and announced his arrival at the club by replicating a picture from his youth.
articles.content:
